title: List of all Android dashboard  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android dashboard  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: candybar-library
repoList.description: Android icon pack material dashboard

repoList.name: wallpaperboard
repoList.description: Android Json based wallpaper dashboard library

repoList.name: Android-Dashboard-Layout-Library
repoList.description: Create your Android app's dashboard easily

repoList.name: wallpaperboard-enhanced
repoList.description: Android Json based wallpaper dashboard library

repoList.name: Android-Dashboard-Ui-Demo
repoList.description: Android Dashboard Ui Demo developed with LinearLayout. Eclipse project (requires ActionBar Compat library)

repoList.name: TapjoySDKAndroid
repoList.description: Tapjoy Android Publisher Library (downloaded from https://dashboard.tapjoy.com/sdk)

repoList.name: Gapo-Dashboard-Demo
repoList.description: An demo app which attempts to use the latest cutting edge libraries and tools.

repoList.name: ZooperUtils
repoList.description: Android Library for Zooper Dashboards.

repoList.name: Frames
repoList.description: A full-of-features, easy-to-customize, free and open source, light-weight, Material Design dashboard library to create Android Wallpapers apps with almost-null effort.

repoList.name: android-api-login
repoList.description: Login and logout functionality, for viewing the account details on the dashboard, using api, Volley Library and SharedPreferences class for session management
